data.title: #LeaveRussia: Oracle Closed its Business in Russia
data.meta_description: #LeaveRussia: Oracle Closed its Business in Russia
data.text:
Exit Completed: company sold its business/assets or its part of the business to a local partner and leaved the market or liquidated local entity(ies)

Exited Exit Completed

Oracle

Oracle Corporation is an American multinational computer technology corporation headquartered in Austin, Texas. In 2020, Oracle was the second-largest software company in the world by revenue and market capitalization.
